code: import React from'react';import{SplitLayout,SelectionChip,NavButton}from'../components';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SkillsScreen(_ref){let{data,update,onNext,onBack}=_ref;const skills=['Leadership','Public Speaking','Design','Marketing','Sales','Finance','Engineering','Data Analysis','Project Management','Writing','Research','Teaching','Consulting','Product Management'];const toggleSkill=skill=>{const current=[...data.skills];const index=current.indexOf(skill);if(index>-1){current.splice(index,1);}else{current.push(skill);}update('skills',current);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SplitLayout,{progress:82,leftTitle:"What can you bring to the table?",rightContent:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{fontSize:'26px',fontWeight:'600',color:'#1a1a1a',marginBottom:'8px'},children:"Select your skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{fontSize:'15px',color:'#666',marginBottom:'24px',lineHeight:'1.5'},children:"What are you good at?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',gap:'12px',marginBottom:'16px'},children:skills.map(skill=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SelectionChip,{label:skill,selected:data.skills.includes(skill),onClick:()=>toggleSkill(skill)},skill))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginTop:'40px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{onClick:onBack,direction:"back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavButton,{onClick:onNext,disabled:data.skills.length===0})]})]})});}export default SkillsScreen;
